help.description:
Shows information about a command and its syntax.
To show a list of commands, do `.info commands`

tt.description:
Tap Titans 2 module. Contains a whole bunch of different things, including Titan Lord timers, titancount, profile cards, relics command, artifacts command, profile cards, and a bunch of other stuff.
For setting TLs, check out `.tt group get` command and the `.tt set` command.
For everything else, try things like `.help titancount`.

tt set.description:
Used for setting settings of the Tap Titans module. If no group is added, you must first do `.tt group add`. If you haven't named your group, you don't need to specify a name (uses `default` ... by default).
To see which settings have been set, and which have not, use the `.tt group get` command.

tt set pings.description: Set the interval (in minutes) for when the timer will ping users befor the next clan quest begins.
tt set pings.requires: GM or Master rank role for TT2

tt set text.description: Set the text used for certain pings and information. There are several tags available: `%time%`, `%spawn%`, `%cq%`, `%round%`, '%group%`.
tt set text.requires: GM or Master rank role for TT2

emote.description: Used to transform an emote into a .jpg or .gif, depending on the emote.

titancount.description: Calculates how many titans you will have at any given stage + IP level.

8ball.description: Ask 8ball a yes or no question and receive an answer.

boss when.description: Displays the remaining time before your clan's next Clan Quest begins.
boss when.requires: Can only be run from the `when` channel set by admin

boss clear.description: Clears any previously set boss timer.
boss clear.requires: GM or master or timer rank

math.description:
Used to do calculations.
Operations:
+ (addition)
- (subtraction)
\* (multiplication)
/ (division)
^ (exponentiation)
√ (square root)
% (modulo)
() (parentheses/brackets)

leaderboard.description: Used to look at the current leaderboard, based on XP earned.

bae.description: Tells you if you are, or are not, bae. (Hint: you probably are not bae.)

avatar.description: Shows the avatar of a user. Works for animated avatars.

rank.description: Shows your or a user's current rank in the leaderboards.

info server.description: Gives general information about the server including: region, users, text and voice channels, role count, and owner.

loa.description: Set a leave of absence and let your clan know how long you will be away.
loa.example: .loa 51w29d23h59m59s I'm just really, really lazy, ok?

loa clear.description: Clears your currently set LoA (if you set one).
loa clear.requires: a currently set leave of absence and a tt2 related role

suggestion.description: File a suggestion or enhancement request.
suggestion.requires: more than 30 characters and one per hour maximum
suggestion.example: .suggest Let the bot quote images in the quotes channel.

boss.description: A collection of commands for setting and clearing the Clan Quest boss timer.

boss in.description: Sets the boss timer to be in `x` time.

boss ttk.description: Sets the boss timer by the time-to-kill of the last boss.

restrict.description: Restricts a command to a specified role. More than one role can be set.

loas.description: Displays a list of leave-of-absence messages set by members.

bug.description: Files a bug report with the bot.
bug.requires: more than 30 characters and no more than one bug an hour
bug.example: .bug So erm, there's this thing ... and, well, it's not working. HELP!!

support.description: Gets a link to the official bot server.
